code.name: _InvalidRequest
code.description: At least one of the input parameter has an invalid value, or the combination of input parameter values is invalid or a required input parameter is missing.

code.name: _InvalidResponse
code.description: At least one of the output parameter has an invalid value or a required output parameter is missing.

code.name: _InvalidSessionID
code.description: The specified session identifier has an invalid format.

code.name: _UnknownSessionID
code.description: The specified session identifier is unknown.
